name: Gil's Island
description:
Gil's Island is a fan made game based around Gil. The mascot of https://Guilded.GG a chat program with a lot of unique features. This game is in no way shape or form associated with Guilded themselves and was simply a fan made game as I liked the mascot Gil.  It is also not associated with Xyphien LLC at all.  This game is still in Beta, and is being worked on. There may be some small and large changes with every update. It's suggested to restart your game from the beginning with every new update, however there's instructions on how to keep your saves when updating the game. Characters might be removed, changed, Credits may change, gameplay could be changed or removed. Being in Beta a lot could happen based off of feedback. Please take the time to review the game after playing and give me any feedback. It's always welcomed. If you're unaware what Guilded is check it out at https://Guilded.GG as well as if you'd like to join my personal server  then go to https://guilded.gg/Xyphien-LLC I have not tested the Linux or Mac versions as I do not own them. I compiled them in hopes that they do not work. If they do not please inform me so I can try and get them working.

Chop down trees, mine stone, and build your island from the ground up as well as customize your house how you like it in this Building Simulation game. Unlock new parts of the map, and explore the destroyed mines to fight your way to valuable and rare loot. With every major building you unlock you gain more and more capabilities. From being able to craft your own weapons, to the unlocking of magic!

If you wish to play this on browser (should work with mobile) then go to https://gameguildedserver.net
